name: Global Game Jam: Snow Rescue
description:
Created for the Nunavut Global Game Jam 2021 by the Pinnguaq Iqaluit Makerspace in Iqaluit, Nunavut.  

Control the Snowmobile with Arrow keys

Up and down keys will change your speed
Left and right keys will change your direction

How far will you get when the snowmen come?

Credits:

Logan MacDonald

Courtnery Maerzluft

Jerimah Nuqingaq

Cole Tucker
